name: 曾百由
objective: 先修課程：負責教授同意。自動控制數學基礎、物理系統的數學模式、控制器的種類、時域分析、穩定性分析、根軌跡法、頻率領域的分析、控制系統的設計、Z 轉換、數位控制、電腦控制之介面及程式、現代控制理論與簡介。實習項目：MATLAB介紹與應用、暫態響應、PID 控制的影響、Lead-Lag控制的影響、頻率響應、系統判別、控制器設計。
schedule:
1.　　Introduction
2.　　Mathematical Models of Systems
3.　　Laplace Transform and Transfer Functions
4.　　Introduction of MATLAB
5.　　State Variable Models
6.　　Feedback (FB) Control System Characteristics
7.　　Performance of FB Systems
8.　　Mid-Term Test Stability of Linear FB Systems
9.　　Stability of Linear FB Systems
10.　　Root Locus Method
11.　　Frequency Response Method
12.　　Frequency Response Method
13.　　Mid-Term Test Stability in Frequency Domain
14.　　Stability in Frequency Domain
15.　　Design of FB Control Systems
16.　　Design of FB Control Systems
17.　　Final Test
scorePolicy:
1st Mid-Term Test 20%
2nd Mid-Term Test 30%
Final Exam 350%
Homework and Participation 15%
materials: Ogata, ”Modern Control Engineering,” 3rd Edition, Prentice Hall
